TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ListViewHitTestLocations extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines constants that represent areas in a or .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ListViewHitTestLocations enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestInfo> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HitTest%2A> method to determine the location of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>. To run this code, paste it into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `listView1` that is populated with items. Associate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event for `listview1` and the form with the `HandleMouseDown` method in this example.
[!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewWhidbeyProperties#7](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.l_16_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewWhidbeyProperties#7](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.l_16_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations AboveClientArea = int32(256)

Docs.summary: A position above the client portion of a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations BelowClientArea = int32(16)

Docs.summary: A position below the client portion of a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations Image = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A position within the bounds of an image contained in a or .

Docs.summary: A position within the bounds of a text area contained in a or .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations LeftOfClientArea = int32(64)

Docs.summary: A position to the left of the client portion of a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations None = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A position outside the bounds of a

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations RightOfClientArea = int32(32)

Docs.summary: A position to the right of the client portion of a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ListViewHitTestLocations StateImage = int32(512)

Docs.summary: A position within the bounds of an image associated with a that indicates the state of the item.
